task.title: Vegan Fried Chicken Ingredients
task.shortdesc: This vegan fried chicken is half of an amazing chicken and waffles recipie that is entirely vegan while busting the stereotype of bland, uninspired vegan cooking. The spices and seasoning in this "toficken" will bring it to the next level and really wake you up in the morning.

ol.li: 3 flax eggs (1 tablespoon ground flax seeds, plus 3 tablespoons of water per egg), mixed with ice cold almond milk
